headline: How PayPal’s New Transaction Graph Analytics Program Will Impact PayPal Holdings (PYPL) Investors
summary: In early January 2026, PayPal launched its Transaction Graph Insights & Measurement program, giving merchants and advertisers a cross-merchant view of real shopper behavior, campaign performance, and data-driven recommendations using transaction data from more than 430 million consumer accounts and tens of millions of merchants. This initiative highlights how PayPal can translate its broad payment footprint into a full-funnel commerce media and analytics offering, with early clients such as...
